attributes.action: Have a NATIONAL agreement to arrest,detain,and return Wanted Paedophiles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a victim of a paedophile back in the eighties, and having taken the courage with others to take the offender to court, the offender fled the UK to the Phillipines before sentencing. He received 9 years but has been a fugitive since January 2007. There needs to be a National Agreement for all convicted Paedophiles to be returned to the country where the conviction has taken place. Help protect others.
